text:
Gas prices have officially DOUBLED since President Biden took office, and as a result, Hoosiers are paying an average of $5 a gallon. 

It's time for this administration to support American energy, not boost our dependence on foreign oil. https://t.co/GDTZ2HY3jC

Tomorrow, staff will be in Clinton County to help constituents work through issues with federal agencies. Check back here or visit my website for upcoming locations: https://t.co/DSeclUfsxF https://t.co/EL4xKgQcBq

“Our sons, pride of our Nation, this day have set upon a mighty endeavor, a struggle to preserve our Republic, our religion, & our civilization, & to set free a suffering humanity.” - FDR

Today, we remember the courageous Americans who stormed the beaches of Normandy 78 yrs ago https://t.co/0hSvgNaqKA

Monday, staff will be in Newton County to help constituents work through issues with federal agencies. Visit my website for more information and upcoming locations: https://t.co/DSeclUfsxF https://t.co/mFuY249iT3

Hoosiers are spending thousands more a year on gas alone, struggling to afford everyday essentials, and are often still unable to find baby formula to feed their infants; they want substantive and swift action, not delayed or half-hearted admissions of error. https://t.co/sJcTmtndiU

This week, we kick off #NationalDairyMonth. 

Please join me in thanking our dairy farmers who have worked tirelessly through a pandemic and supply chain crisis to ensure millions of Americans can consistently access affordable and nutritious dairy products.

Families are now spending $5k more this year on gas, forcing many to rethink family plans & activities. Hoosiers shouldn't have to rearrange their daily lives to accommodate this admin's costly policies, yet for too many families across our state, that's become their new reality.
